name: sofidev-garrux-portfolio-template
title: SofiDev /Garrux  Portfolio template
desc: Welcome to the Portfolio Template built with Astro! If you're looking to showcase your projects in style, you've come to the right place. In this guide, we'll walk you through everything you need to know to get started with this sleek and responsive template.
article:
Use this template by running:

npm create astro@latest -- --template SofiDevO/portfolio-sofidev-garrux

Crafting Your Portfolio

Your portfolio is your digital storefront, where potential clients and employers can get a glimpse of your skills and expertise. With the Portfolio Template, you can create a visually stunning showcase that leaves a lasting impression.

Getting Started

To begin crafting your portfolio, head over to /src/data/portfolioData.js. Here, you'll find a structured format to add details about each of your projects, including images, titles, descriptions, and relevant URLs.


// Sample Portfolio Data Format
export const portfolioData = [
  {
    imgSrc: 'https://example.com/project1.png',
    title: 'Project 1',
    skills: ['React', 'StyledComponents'],
    description: 'A brief description of your project.',
    demoURL: '',
    repoURL: '',
    anim: 'fade-right',
  },
  // Add more projects here
];

Adding Icons with Iconify

Enhance your project listings with icons using Iconify. Simply specify the icon identifier in your data and include the Iconify script in your project.


<!-- Example Icon Usage -->
<iconify-icon icon="logos:react" width="27" height="27"></iconify-icon>

Leveraging Modern Technologies

Behind the scenes, the Portfolio Template makes use of cutting-edge technologies to deliver a seamless experience.

  • Astro: A modern static site builder that optimizes for performance by shipping less JavaScript.
  • React: A powerful JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
  • Tailwind CSS: A utility-first CSS framework that enables rapid styling and customization.
  • Styled Components: A popular library for styling React components with ease.
  • Iconify: A comprehensive library for accessing thousands of icons from different collections.

Bringing Your Design to Life

With the Portfolio Template, you have the flexibility to customize every aspect of your portfolio to reflect your unique style and personality. Whether you're a designer, developer, or creative professional, this template provides the perfect canvas to showcase your work.

Designing with Figma

To help you get started, we've provided a Figma design link where you can explore and edit the visual elements of the template. Let your creativity run wild and make your portfolio truly stand out!

Figma Design Link

Connect with Us

We're constantly improving and updating the Portfolio Template to meet the needs of our users. If you encounter any bugs or have suggestions for new features, we'd love to hear from you!

Author and License

  • Author: SofiDev / Garrux
  • License: MIT

Get Involved

Join the community on GitHub and contribute to the ongoing development of the Portfolio Template. Together, we can build something truly remarkable!

GitHub Repository

Start Building Today

Ready to take your portfolio to the next level? Download the Portfolio Template and begin crafting your masterpiece. Whether you're a seasoned professional or just starting out, this template has everything you need to showcase your talent and expertise.

Download Portfolio Template
